description.component: The Table component with support for Bootstrap

caption.name: Caption
caption.description: A localized string for the `<caption>` tag.

header.name: Table header cells
header.description: Table header cells which contains (tag, attributes, content, field, sort)

sticky.name: Sticky
sticky.description: A flag indicating whether to use a sticky table header.

rows.name: Rows
rows.description: Table rows, which each row contains (attributes, data, no_striping, cells). Each cell contains (tag, attributes, content, active_table_sort)

footer.name: Footer
footer.description: Table footer rows, in the same format as the rows variable.

empty.name: Empty
empty.description: The message to display in an extra row if table does not have any rows.

no_striping.name: No Striping
no_striping.description: A boolean indicating that the row should receive no striping.

header_columns.name: Header Columns
header_columns.description: The number of columns in the header.

color.name: Table Background Color
color.description: Set a background contextual classes to color tables

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes. Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom CSS classes over to the table element.

thead_utility_classes.name: Table Head Utility Classes
thead_utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes. Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom CSS classes over to the head of the table element.

tbody_utility_classes.name: Table Body Utility Classes
tbody_utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes. Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom CSS classes over to the body of the table element.

tfoot_utility_classes.name: Table Footer Utility Classes
tfoot_utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes. Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom CSS classes over to the footer of the table element.
